title: pancAsyayAnE
sahitya:
pancAsyayAnE pancaprEdAsanE


anupallavi

  sancitavE mOdalemmA sakala karmAvaLiya 
sancitava nIDADu sakala bhAgyava nIDu


caraNam    sancarIka cikurE shAbEyahArE pancadasha gamakAdi bhAva shrutisArE
 sancalAkSi gauri cakra paripAlini pancamukha harikEsha parama sukhadAyini
